resources.string: Select on which BT device to start the app.
Only available on Pie and above, make sure you turned on the incoming listener in HUR. Requires HUR 4.6 or higher!
Without location permissions app won\'t be able to access Wifi network names which is crucial part for automation.
Starting with Android 10, background services are restricted to start apps/activities on users screen, meaning it won\'t be able to launch Android Auto without this permission.
Exit car mode and stop Wifi Launcher when BT disconnects (some cars constantly drops BT connection meaning app can randomly quit) in which case you should disable this option.
